es.us.isa.aml

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.us.isa.aml.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    The Store class stores all the templates, offers and agreements in a map.
    Author:
    jdelafuente

      • registerFromFolder

        public void registerFromFolder(java.lang.String folderPath,
                               java.lang.Boolean recursive)
        Parse and register all the files contained in the folder provided. You can specify a boolean to determine if a recursive search is needed or not.
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The path to the folder that contains all the files
        recursive - The Boolean that determines if a recursive search is needed
